name: CREWORKS Manual Wire Stripper Machine, 0.06"-1" Wire Stripping Machine, Wire Stripping Tool for 1.5-25mm Scrap Wire, Drill Powered Cable Stripper for DIY Cable, Copper Wire Stripper for Leftover Cable
short_description: Wire Stripping Made Easy: The Creworks manual wire stripping machine features an easy-to-handle hand crank to power its steel blade and remove insulation from scrap wires. Connect your power drill to this wire stripper for automatic cranking
Big or Small, We Strip It All: The 3 feed hole plates for this cable stripper cover wires from 0.06" to 1" (1.5 to 25 mm), letting you safely and easily handle the most common wire sizes

Effortless Operation: Set the blade height to suit your exact needs using the adjustment knob, feed your leftover cable through the appropriate hole, and turn the hand crank to peel off the insulation
Clean Cut Every Time: This wire stripping tool's alloy steel blade maintains its sharp edge for clean cuts with each use. The reinforced aluminum frame ensures dependable and long-lasting use
Portable on the Go: This cable stripping machine is small and easy to carry. Take it from your home to shed, workshop, or worksite, and turn your scrap wires into valuable treasure wherever needed

name: Klein Tools 80013 Wire Stripper / Ratcheting Crimper, Electrical Crimping Tool Kit with Automatic Wire Stripper and Ratcheting Insulated Terminal Crimper, 2-Piece
short_description: A complete, high-performance kit that offers convenience and value
Wire Stripper Tool and Crimper 2-Piece Tool Kit includes everything a tradesman needs for insulated terminal crimping, wire stripping and cutting
Ratcheting Crimper (Cat No. 3005CR) crimps only insulated terminals onto 10-22 AWG stranded copper wire
Crimping Tool features adjustable compound action design putting more crimping power into each squeeze
Three crimping cavities in one tool: 22–16 AWG (Red), 16–14 AWG (Blue) and 12–10 AWG (Yellow) insulated terminals
Self Adjusting Wire Stripper and Cutter (Cat. No. 11061) adjusts to strip 10-20 AWG solid, 12-22 AWG stranded, and 12/2 and 14/2 Romex cable (all sizes) and other nonmetallic (type NM) sheathed cable
Adjustable stopper to control the length of the core strip
product_description: This 2-Piece Klein Tools Wire Stripper and Ratcheting Crimper tool kit is perfect for crimping, wire stripping and cutting. The full-cycle Ratcheting Crimper crimps 10-22 AWG insulated wire terminals. The Self-Adjusting Wire Stripper / Cutter features a self-adjusting stripping head for quick, precise wire stripping. For more than 160 years, Klein Tools has manufactured premium-quality, professional-grade hand tools that deliver the performance, durability and precision needed to get the job done right. Our family of engineers, workers and craftsman continue to put six generations of expertise into every tool we create by using only the highest quality materials, superior workmanship, and keeping manufacturing as close to home as we can. Klein isn't just the name of our company, it's also our family name. And since we're an American company that's family-owned and family-run, you know you can count on us to be here tomorrow. Klein Tools doesn't just make great products, we make great products that stand up to the demands of the professionals who use them every day ... Since 1857.
